assignments.title: Pre-Assignment
assignments.description: This is pre-work for the course Negotiation Skills. Please see the attached file.

assignments.title: Quiz Questions
assignments.description: Please complete the quiz questions listed in the attached file. This will be worth 50 points.

assignments.title: Test Questions
assignments.description: Please answer the test questions listed in the attached file. This will be worth 100 points of your final grade.

assignments.title: Evaluation Plan
assignments.description: For this assignment, you will be composing a plan for how you plan to evaluate potential challenges throughout the lifecycle of your project. Use a hypothetical business idea as the project.

assignments.title: Learning Journal
assignments.description: This should contain 10 entries, each about a paragraph long, about something new you learned from an assignment or lecture.

announcements.title: Introduction

assignments.title: Communication Management Plan
assignments.description: Please create a hypothetical communication management plan for a business idea of your choosing. You should explain the vehicles of transportation you plan to use, the stakeholders with whom you must communicate, and the importance of communication in your project.
